section.p: Clinical Procedures provided and or performed for the patient during the Encounter.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] comments with data type String
Textual Description of the procedure.

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date and time the professional service was performed

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
A value specifying the state of this patient encounter (based on the RIM Act class state machine), for example, active, aborted, completed

Contains zero or more [0..*] complication, where its type is Complication Event
An undesirable event experienced by a patient whilst undergoing a clinical procedure, especially if the event was caused by the procedure itself.
Contains at least one [1..*] clinicalPractitionerPerformer, where its type is Practitioner Lite
Contains exactly one [1..1] performer, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] relatedProcedure, where its type is Related Procedure
Contains zero or more [0..*] procedureList, where its type is Procedure List Entry

Contains exactly one [1..1] comments with data type String
Textual Description of the procedure.

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date and time the professional service was performed

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
A value specifying the state of this patient encounter (based on the RIM Act class state machine), for example, active, aborted, completed

Contains zero or more [0..*] complication, where its type is Complication Event
An undesirable event experienced by a patient whilst undergoing a clinical procedure, especially if the event was caused by the procedure itself.
Contains at least one [1..*] clinicalPractitionerPerformer, where its type is Practitioner Lite
Contains exactly one [1..1] performer, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] relatedProcedure, where its type is Related Procedure
Contains zero or more [0..*] procedureList, where its type is Procedure List Entry
